title: Smeg 50s Retro Style Mini Refrigerator FAB5 - Overview
description:
Smeg 50s Retro Style Mini Right Hinge Red Refrigerator - FAB5URR http://www.abt.com/product/91531/Smeg-FAB5URR.html

Retro lines and color schemes for stylish icons: appliances that embody the glamor and smooth forms of the 1950s. SMEG 50s retro-style refrigerators have become recongized around the world as cult objects.
Contemporary design functionality and low energy consumption combine to create this desirable but essential household object.
Specifications:
• Capacity: 1.5 Cu. Ft.
• Refrigerator
o Absorption cooling = ultra low noise level
o Automatic defrost
o LED Internal light
o 2 adjustable shelves
o Door storage: 1 balcony shelf 1 bottle shelf
o Ice cube tray
• Electrical:
o Voltage: 115 V
o Current: 10Amps
o Frequency: 60Hz
When positioning these appliances adjacent to kitchen unit a gap of 6 7/8 must be left on the hinged side of the product to allow the door to open. When positioning next to a wall it is reommended to leave a larger gap of 12 1/2.
